item.title: Polaroid Cameras
item.description: Polaroid 80 Years of Cameras Pack Film -Land Cameras 100-400 Series Integral Film Integral FIlm is very different from pack film since the positive and negative are incorperated into one photo. This eliminates the need to pull the photo apart after a minute of fixing or so. Removes all needed skill in the development cycle. -SX-70 -600 -Spectra Zink FIlm
